hooks.command: file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; if [ -n "$file" ] && [[ "$file" == *.py ]]; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && ruff format --quiet "$file" 2>/dev/null && ruff check --fix --quiet "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi

file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; if [ -n "$file" ] && [[ "$file" == *.ts || "$file" == *.tsx || "$file" == *.js || "$file" == *.jsx || "$file" == *.css ]]; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/frontend" && npx prettier --write "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi

file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; if [ -n "$file" ] && [[ "$file" == *.py ]]; then if grep -qE '(member_timeout|max_interactions_to_share|timeout_seconds|show_tool_calls)' "$file" 2>/dev/null; then echo 'WARNING: File contains known invalid Agno params (member_timeout, max_interactions_to_share, timeout_seconds, show_tool_calls). Verify with: python3 -c "import inspect; from agno.X import Y; print(inspect.signature(Y.__init__))"' >&2; fi; fi

file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; if [ -n "$file" ] && [[ "$file" == *.mdx ]]; then if ! head -10 "$file" 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^title:'; then echo 'WARNING: MDX file missing title in frontmatter. Every MDX page needs title and description.' >&2; fi; if ! head -10 "$file" 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^description:'; then echo 'WARNING: MDX file missing description in frontmatter.' >&2; fi; fi

file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; if [ -n "$file" ] && [[ "$file" == */uv.lock || "$file" == */pnpm-lock.yaml ]]; then echo 'BLOCK: Do not edit lockfiles directly. Use mise run setup (backend) or mise run frontend:setup (frontend).' >&2; exit 2; fi

file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; if [ -n "$file" ] && [[ "$file" == */.env || "$file" == */.env.* ]]; then echo 'BLOCK: Do not edit .env files â€” they contain secrets. Edit example.env instead.' >&2; exit 2; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '\bgit commit\b'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && mise run validate 2>&1 | tail -20; exit_code=$?; if [ $exit_code -ne 0 ]; then echo 'BLOCK: Validation failed. Fix issues before committing.' >&2; exit 2; fi; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '\bgit commit\b'; then changed=$(cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && git diff --cached --name-only 2>/dev/null); if echo "$changed" | grep -qE 'backend/(agents|teams|workflows)/'; then if ! echo "$changed" | grep -qE '(docs/|README.md|PROJECT_INDEX.md)'; then echo 'WARNING: Backend agent/team/workflow files staged but no docs updated. Consider updating: README.md, PROJECT_INDEX.md, docs/, .serena/memories/project-overview.md' >&2; fi; fi; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '\bgit commit\b'; then staged=$(cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && git diff --cached --name-only 2>/dev/null); if echo "$staged" | grep -qE 'backend/auth/(routes|middleware)\.py'; then if ! echo "$staged" | grep -q 'backend/main.py'; then echo 'WARNING: backend/auth/routes.py or middleware.py staged without backend/main.py. Verify rate limiter registration and middleware order are consistent.' >&2; fi; fi; fi
